5.11B
  • During Mild Breeze, place Drifting (i.e. gray) Dispersed SMOKE downwind of:
    • each Blaze
    • each white SMOKE counter that has none (A24.61)
    [EXC: NA in cave; G11.851]

5.13A
  • During Gusts (B25.651):
    • Remove Dispersed SMOKE.
    • Flip remaining SMOKE counters to Dispersed side.
    [EXC: NA in Cave; G11.8]
